alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:06AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ransom, southwestern Cass and southeastern Barnes Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 106 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lucca, or 18 miles southeast of Valley City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enderlin, Sheldon, Fingal, Chaffee, Nome, Embden and Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
